commitMessage:
@@@JavaHL: First attempt to port the JavaHL tests to the new org.apache.subversion
package.  The tests should now compile with 'make javahl-compat-tests'.  but
it is doubtful they will run and/or pass.

* Makefile.in:
  Add check-javahl-compat target.

* build.conf
  (javahl-compat-tests): New.

[ in subversion/bindings/javahl/ ]
* tests/org/apache/subversion/javahl/SVNAdminTests.java. 
  tests/org/apache/subversion/javahl/BasicTests.java. 
  tests/org/apache/subversion/javahl/RunTests.java. 
  tests/org/apache/subversion/javahl/SVNTests.java. 
  tests/org/apache/subversion/javahl/WC.java. 
  src/org/apache/subversion/javahl/NotifyAction.java. 
  src/org/apache/subversion/javahl/IInput.java. 
  src/org/apache/subversion/javahl/LogDate.java. 
  src/org/apache/subversion/javahl/BlameCallbackImpl.java. 
  src/org/apache/subversion/javahl/LogMessage.java. 
  src/org/apache/subversion/javahl/ScheduleKind.java. 
  src/org/apache/subversion/javahl/IOutput.java. 
  src/org/apache/subversion/javahl/SVNAdmin.java. 
  src/org/apache/subversion/javahl/MergeinfoLogKind.java. 
  src/org/apache/subversion/javahl/Path.java:
  New.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/subversion/trunk@904709 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

@@@JavaHL: Followup to the change to Java 5.0 language features: get rid of
Iterators in the test suite.

[ in subversion/bindings/javahl/tests/ ]
* org/apache/subversion/javahl/BasicTests.java. 
  org/apache/subversion/javahl/SVNTests.java. 
  org/apache/subversion/javahl/WC.java:
    Remove any use of iterators in favor of the new for-each loop.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/subversion/trunk@916783 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

@@@JavaHL: Use the java.net.URI class internally in the tests.  There are a few
places we can / should use it in the public API as a more appropriate type
than a simple String.  but testing it out on the tests first is initialy safer.

[ in subversion/bindings/javahl/ ]
* tests/org/apache/subversion/javahl/SVNAdminTests.java:
  Update API calls to de-wrap the URI.

* tests/org/apache/subversion/javahl/BasicTests.java:
  Same.

* tests/org/apache/subversion/javahl/SVNTests.java
  (OneTest.makeReposUrl): Return a URI.
  (OneTest.url): Change from String to URI.
  (OneTest.getUrl): Return a URI.
  (OneTest.createInitialWorkingCopy): Use the URI type.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/subversion/trunk@992010 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

@@@JavaHL: Some gratuitous refactoring: Rename the Info2 class to just Info.

[ in subversion/bindings/javahl/ ]
* tests/org/apache/subversion/javahl/SVNReposTests.java. 
  tests/org/apache/subversion/javahl/BasicTests.java. 
  src/org/tigris/subversion/javahl/SVNClient.java. 
  src/org/tigris/subversion/javahl/Info2.java. 
  src/org/tigris/subversion/javahl/Info.java. 
  native/CreateJ.cpp. 
  native/InfoCallback.cpp. 
  native/EnumMapper.cpp. 
  native/CreateJ.h. 
  src/org/apache/subversion/javahl/callback/InfoCallback.java:
    Update references.

* src/org/apache/subversion/javahl/Info2.java:
  Move from here...

  src/org/apache/subversion/javahl/Info.java:
  ...to here.  and update class name and refernces.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/subversion/trunk@1031161 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

@@@* subversion/bindings/javahl/tests/org/apache/subversion/javahl/BasicTests.java
  (testBasicInfo2): Expect depth unknown on files via the new api.

* subversion/bindings/javahl/tests/org/tigris/subversion/javahl/BasicTests.java
  (testBasicInfo2): Expect depth unknown on files via the new api.

* subversion/libsvn_client/deprecated.c
  (info_from_info2): Restore old value for the old api.  but watch out not to
    override excluded.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/subversion/trunk@1132461 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

@@@As a failed attempt to fix the JavaHL tests on the buildbots.  revert the javahl
test changes of r1132461. I expected that javahl used the new libsvn_client info
api.  but it looks like it still uses the old version.

Somehow this patch just reverses the real and expected values.

* subversion/bindings/javahl/tests/org/apache/subversion/javahl/BasicTests.java
  (testBasicInfo2): Expect depth unknown on files via the old api.

* subversion/bindings/javahl/tests/org/tigris/subversion/javahl/BasicTests.java
  (testBasicInfo2): Expect depth unknown on files via the old api.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/subversion/trunk@1132495 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

@@@Try to make the javahl tests pass on the buildbots.

* subversion/bindings/javahl/tests/org/tigris/subversion/javahl/BasicTests.java
* subversion/bindings/javahl/tests/org/apache/subversion/javahl/BasicTests.java
  (BasicTests.testBasicInfo2): Add path to assert message.  adjust depth
   expectaitions based on node type.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/subversion/trunk@1132942 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
